website_summaries.verdict: For those who enjoy packing a healthier lunch for school or work, this is a great choice. Smaller compartments encourage smaller portions.
pros: Lid fits securely, but still opens easily
Attractive outer shell design with soft touch texture
cons: Food stains difficult to remove completely

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I adore this bento box. ultra portable and I get a ton of compliments on it. (even though most people can't seem to figure out what it is) the outside can stain as others have said, but I have managed to avoid any major issues except for a curry mishap. One suggestion - use the darker colored one for foods that may have staining issues (usually lunch for me) and then the white one for foods that won't cause as much of a problem (breakfast) overall I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pikkon

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in a laptop bag.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space in here. Since it comes apart into 2 sealed boxes, I can always find a way to fit it in my bag. Easy to clean, dishwasher save, only one divider though, so don't lose it. It says it is microwave safe, but I think that it warped the container a little. It takes a little creativity to fit large fruits or sandwiches in here, but the lids hold well, so you can cram a lot in.
customer_reviews.author: J.Tenneyson

customer_reviews.title: but it does not work as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: If you are more concerned about aesthetics, it is a cute bento box, but it does not work as good as it looks! It does not shut properly, leaving room for liquid, or food juices to seep out of the sides. A bento box this price should not have any leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little Bento kit -- with plenty of room for a standard lunch! Cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Earnric

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: After washing it in the dish washer, the lid can no longer fit in tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Young Fowler

customer_reviews.title: I wish it wasn't plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to conserve space and be lighter, and it definitely does the job. It also does not leak which is great since it lives in my backpack. I just wish it wasn't plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Cher522

customer_reviews.title: Super stylish, easy to clean and enough to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish, easy to clean and enough to take lunch+snacks container. Everybody in the office are jealous! I am thinking to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and it looks awesome! The appearance is beautiful...and the quality seems high. I have yet to eat out this, but it just arrived. I would have surely appreciated another one or two dividers.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love that BENTO
customer_reviews.text: This Bento box works perfectly for my lunches. I eat vegetarian and fairly light. Holds all I need; a small salad, some seeds or nuts, and a few grapes or cherries, etc. Holds more than enough. Good way to control portions since most of us eat too much anyways. Keeps you thinking about how much you are bringing. It has room enough for somewhat more than I generally take. The box itself seems well made and is aesthetically pleasing as well. That, of course, is part of the appeal of the Bento Box. A meal should be more than packing in the calories. Feed the soul as well as the body!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: ... manufacturer but because I think I'm becoming a junkie love this line so much if I could I think ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I bought and I won't be purchasing any more not because of the quality or the manufacturer but because I think I'm becoming a junkie love this line so much if I could I think I'd buy every color but I can't so my husband says no more ordering from this product for my marriage sake
customer_reviews.author: Rae WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Really good product. Pricey, but the money saved from eating out justified the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Give it five starts because for high priced plastic, they did a great job making them. Surprisingly small, but once they are used, you realize that they hold a good amount of food. The money saved by packing my own meal easily justified the initial cost. The two color choice turned out to be quite functional. They also look nice and will likely last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little bento box
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little bento box. You can fit more inside it than you think you can, and it's helped me immensely with controlling portion sizes at lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nideffer

customer_reviews.title: ... a very attractive lunch box and there are some useful accessories also available
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive lunch box and there are some useful accessories also available. Actually holds more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... it yet but from the get go this looks like a really quality product (which it should be given ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but from the get go this looks like a really quality product (which it should be given the cost). The directions/product info in the box gave a lot of info which I appreciated (potential staining, cleaning ideas, etc.). My first impression of the product is that it's smaller than I thought, but not unpleasantly so. It will fit nicely in my existing lunchbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute bento box in the purse!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bento box. The design is very neat. It can contain more than enough food for a girl's lunch, maybe even enough for a average guy lunch. Better news, it can be fit into my purses. It totally encourages me to bring lunch to work more.
customer_reviews.author: mning

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bento for both portion control and commuting
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bento for both portion control and commuting. I don't use it every day but I'm always happy with it when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Krogman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much! I always use it from Monday to Friday.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice lunch box.
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as it looks I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Turns heads every time i take it out. Holds up great, although i don't put it in the dishwasher. The only think that i wish it did, was come with two bands. One that is smaller incase you only want to take half with you one day.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor4U

customer_reviews.title: ... time with the lids but my kids remove them easily. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have a difficult time with the lids but my kids remove them easily. Easy to clean. Thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I love these monbento boxes and this one did not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: lululeilei

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and practical. Cant wait to use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Fox

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product functions well but I am dissappointed with the quality of the resin for the large price tag.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: i like bento boxes
customer_reviews.text: it stores a a giant block, but overall, i like it. it doesn't seem to leak. the divider is not permament, so soupy, saucy foods can migrate. use a cup cake liner. overall it is good, and great for portion control
customer_reviews.author: P. Alscher

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: the last to go lunch box thing i had leaked so i was looking for a good replacement. so far so good. fits nicely in my backpack so commuting is a peace of cake.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nagaye

customer_reviews.title: roomie and modern looking
customer_reviews.text: very rommie bento box. I pack my lunch and dinner altogether in a single box.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with liquids.
customer_reviews.text: This bento box has a beautiful design esthetic, but the lids don't seal very convincingly. Think twice before trusting that it won't leak in your bag.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bearce

customer_reviews.title: Great Except for Ease of Transport
customer_reviews.text: This gets 5+ stars except it's in need of a carrying strap or something as it doesn't fit in my backpack or work bag as is. Buying their $10 bag for it? Not interested.
customer_reviews.author: SpeechDiva

customer_reviews.title: Plastic stains alot. Only recommended for bland foods.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this Bento box due to its great design and separate compartments. However, the plastic stains terribly from many ethnic and not so ethnic foods.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

product_meta.title: monbento MB Original Bento Box, Grey/White
product_meta.description: monbento MB original bento box - grey / white. Suitable for dishwasher. Suitable for microwave by opening the silicone cap of the intermediary lid. Suitable for use in refrigerator or freezer. BPA free. 100% airtight.
feature_bullets: Suitable for microwave by opening the silicone cap of the intermediary lid
Suitable for use in refrigerator or freezer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars161 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
